channel.title: Projects on Mason Zhang
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on Mason Zhang

item.title: Keyboards
item.description: Intro During the summer of 2020, I stumbled upon the mechanical keyboard hobby. I had heard about it before, but wrote it off as a waste of money. Who’d spend 150 bucks on some plastic keycaps? I guess having an engineering income changes you - I’d end up spending a few thousand in total on all my keyboard purchases. From the very beginning, the keyboard I had my eyes on was the Satisfaction75.

item.title: Art 2022
item.description: Intro For the longest time, I’ve wanted to get into art. Every once in a while, I’d see amazing concept art online and get a brief burst of inspiration. I’d think to myself, “Damn, I wanna make something like that. But then I’d think about all the time and effort necessary to get to a professional level, and I’d give up before starting. I don’t know what changed, but at the end of last year (late December 2021), I finally found the motivation to get started.

item.title: Website
item.description: Inspiration I’ve been meaning to make a website for a while. In college, the thought process was to create a digital portfolio to showcase my worth. Now that I’ve graduated and have some time to kill before starting work, it’s mostly just a fun project for self-improvement purposes and to practice writing. I figured I could document all of my hobby projects and share some of my thoughts online rather than letting everything sit on a hard drive, for my eyes only.
